amendment.description: An amendment to prohibit use of funds for research, development, test or evaluation for the F-35 Joint Strike Fighter to modify the F-35 Joint Strike Fighter in a manner that provides B-61 delivery capability until the date that a report has been delivered to the Congressional defense committees outlining costs and capabilities.

action.text: Mr. Frelinghuysen raised a point of order against the Garamendi amendment (A031). Mr. Frelinghuysen stated that the provisions of the Garamendi amendment sought to change existing law and constituted legislation in an appropriations bill. The Chair sustained the point of order.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A031) offered by Mr. Garamendi.
